original: One of the best-selling painkillers on the market today, Alad-in has proven to be phenomenally successful in rural America.  The time-release outer coating is easily removed and Alad-ins can be eaten, snorted or injected into the neck.  This has a street value of around $300.
translated: 市面上最畅销的止痛药之一。事实证明，Alad-in在美国农村地区取得了惊人的成功。缓释涂层很容易去除，可以口服、鼻吸或颈部注射。市价通常在$300左右。
